pages.text: I really dislike how the advancements are loaded in Minecraft. I believe it shouldn't be a 'top-to-bottom' sort of deal, but there's not really anything I can do about it.$(br2)The BaerCraft quest book was quite empty ever since I lost interest in the lore. To make up for the piss-poor advancement loading order, I've decided to merge the
quest book and BaerCraft advancements (mainly just the collecting-type advancements, but others too), so you can easily keep track of your quests/advancements without having an occasional stroke.
